title: Happy Birthday Hermann Zapf
content:
[http://www.creativepro.com/story/feature/23728.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080316192559/http:/www.creativepro.com/story/feature/23728.html "http://www.creativepro.com/story/feature/23728.html")

Say its your birthday, happy birthday to you…

 [‹ type suggestions](http://web.archive.org/web/20080316192559/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16751 "Go to previous forum topic") [Native Fontographer for Mac OS X now available ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080316192559/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16477 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Dan Weaver

comments.content:
Thanks for the link.

Happy Birthday.

AS
The actual date of Hermann Zapf’s birthday in November 8th (which is on the Typophile iCal birthday calendar…). Thanks for posting this link Dan, I haven’t seen it yet. Must be brand new!
A pity that it isn’t 12 December, ’cos then he would share a birthday with Frank Sinatra (who would be 90 today). Happy (belated) Birthday to Prof. Zapf though.
